attributes.action: Stop Halal food. It's very cruel the way the animals are slaughtered.
attributes.additional_details: It's barbaric and cruel.  Can be done quickly and peacefully.
attributes.background:
Stop the process of Halal meat. 
There is no need to have the animals killed in such barbaric way.
Normal slaughter houses do the work as they have for decades without causing pain and suffering to the animals.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban non-stun slaughter in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700557
